definition: variant of 比劃|比划[bi3 hua5]
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: What are you gesturing about with him?
sentences.chinese: 大牛，你們倆還在比畫什麼呢？

sentences.english: The true life have to gesticulate up vivid many.
sentences.chinese: 真人生得比畫上可生動了許多。

sentences.english: Annie had to read all the books for Helen and trace the words into her hand.
sentences.chinese: 安妮得爲她閱讀所有的書籍，並在她手裏比畫單詞。

sentences.english: She, have more wine friend than the artist.
sentences.chinese: 她，是一個酒友比畫友多的藝術家。

sentences.english: Your words leaved are beautiful more than a picture or just words.
sentences.chinese: 你的留言比畫或者純粹的文字都漂亮。

sentences.english: The policeman gestured for us to stop.
sentences.chinese: 警察比畫着叫我們停下來。

sentences.english: The English teacher likes making gestures when he is teaching.
sentences.chinese: 英語老師講課時愛比畫。
